section.title: General information for new users
section.p: Here you find the technical documentation of the Faroese parser project.

The parser is a finite state transducer, capable of analysing and generating any Faroese wordform. The parser is still under development. In november 2006, it recognises 85 % of the wordforms in a corpus containing appr. 2.35 million words.

section.title: Usage
section.p: The parser can be used online, and, with a password, offline, in a command line environment.

section.title: Source code structure
section.p: The parser is construed along the lines of the SÃ¡mi parser project, and much of what is said in the documentation of that project will hold also for Faroese. The obvious difference is the grammatical analysis.
